```{r}
data_occ <- list_prepare_obs_by_sp$PRIGLA_obs_output$distdata %>%
	filter(detected == 1)

# Emplacement
sbbox <- make_bbox(lon = c(min(dist$Lon), max(dist$Lon)),
									 lat = c(min(dist$Lan), max(dist$Lan)),
									 f = 1)

# Création de la carte vide
zone_obs <- get_map(location = sbbox,
										zoom = 8,
										maptype =  "terrain")

zone_obs_map = ggmap(zone_obs) + theme_void()

zone_obs_map + geom_point(data = dist,
														aes(x = Lon,
																y = Lat,
																col = Substratum))
```
